## Axis.ShowMajorGridLines property

要隐藏主要网格线，请将 MajorGridLinesFormat.Line.FillFormat.FillType 设置为 FillType.NoFill. 只读Boolean.

```csharp
public bool ShowMajorGridLines { get; }
```
